statements: SELECT id, soil_type, pH_level, nutrient_levels FROM SoilQuality;
SELECT * FROM SoilQuality WHERE pH_level > 6.5;
SELECT soil_type, id FROM SoilQuality WHERE soil_type = 'Clay';
SELECT id, nutrient_levels FROM SoilQuality WHERE nutrient_levels->>'phosphorus' > 'high';
SELECT id, soil_type, pH_level FROM SoilQuality WHERE pH_level < 7 ORDER BY pH_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM SoilQuality WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, soil_type FROM SoilQuality WHERE pH_level > 6.0;
SELECT id, soil_type, pH_level, nutrient_levels FROM SoilQuality WHERE pH_level < 5.5;
SELECT id, soil_type, nutrient_levels->'phosphorus' AS phosphorus_level FROM SoilQuality WHERE nutrient_levels->'nitrogen' > 20;
SELECT id, soil_type, pH_level, nutrient_levels FROM SoilQuality WHERE soil_type LIKE '%organic%';
SELECT * FROM SoilQuality;
SELECT soil_type, organic_matter FROM SoilQuality WHERE pH_level > 6.5;
SELECT id, nutrient_name, value FROM NutrientLevels ORDER BY value DESC;
SELECT * FROM NutrientLevels WHERE recommended_amount < 10;
SELECT id, soil_type, pH_level FROM SoilQuality WHERE organic_matter >= 3.0;
SELECT soil_type, pH_level, organic_matter FROM SoilQuality WHERE pH_level > 6.5 ORDER BY organic_matter DESC;
SELECT * FROM NutrientLevels WHERE value > 20 AND recommended_amount < 30 ORDER BY nutrient_name;
SELECT nutrient_name, recommended_amount FROM NutrientLevels WHERE nutrient_name LIKE '%potassium%' ORDER BY recommended_amount DESC;
SELECT soil_type, pH_level, organic_matter, (pH_level + organic_matter) AS ph_organic_sum FROM SoilQuality WHERE organic_matter < 2.0 ORDER BY ph_organic_sum;
SELECT s.soil_type, n.nutrient_name, n.value, n.recommended_amount FROM SoilQuality s INNER JOIN NutrientLevels n ON s.id = n.id WHERE n.value < 10 ORDER BY s.soil_type, n.nutrient_name ASC;
SELECT id, ph_level, nutrient_level FROM SoilData;
SELECT crop_name, optimal_ph_level, optimal_nutrient_level FROM CropData;
SELECT recommended_fertilizer, recommended_amount FROM FertilizerRecommendations;
SELECT id, crop_name, optimal_ph_level, optimal_nutrient_level FROM CropData WHERE optimal_ph_level > 5.5;
SELECT * FROM FertilizerRecommendations WHERE recommended_amount < 10;
SELECT id, ph_level, nutrient_level FROM SoilData WHERE ph_level > 6.5 AND nutrient_level > 0.5;
SELECT crop_name, optimal_ph_level, optimal_nutrient_level FROM CropData WHERE optimal_ph_level < 6.0 AND optimal_nutrient_level < 1.0;
SELECT s.id, s.ph_level, c.crop_name, c.optimal_ph_level FROM SoilData s INNER JOIN CropData c ON s.ph_level = c.optimal_ph_level;
SELECT f.recommended_fertilizer, f.recommended_amount, c.crop_name FROM FertilizerRecommendations f INNER JOIN CropData c ON f.crop_id = c.id;
SELECT s.id, s.nutrient_level, c.crop_name, f.recommended_fertilizer FROM SoilData s INNER JOIN CropData c ON s.id = c.id INNER JOIN FertilizerRecommendations f ON c.id = f.crop_id;
SELECT * FROM SoilQuality;
SELECT soil_type, pH_level FROM SoilQuality;
SELECT nutrient_name, nutrient_value FROM NutrientLevels WHERE nutrient_value > 5.0;
SELECT crop_name, fertilizer_type FROM CropRecommendations ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SoilCropRelation WHERE soil_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM SoilQuality WHERE pH_level > 6.5 ORDER BY soil_id DESC;
SELECT soil_type, pH_level FROM SoilQuality WHERE soil_type LIKE '%sandy%' ORDER BY pH_level ASC;
SELECT crop_name, fertilizer_type FROM CropRecommendations WHERE fertilizer_type = 'organic' ORDER BY crop_name;
SELECT nutrient_name FROM NutrientLevels WHERE nutrient_value BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0;
SELECT c.crop_name, s.soil_type FROM CropRecommendations c INNER JOIN SoilCropRelation r ON c.recommendation_id = r.crop_id INNER JOIN SoilQuality s ON r.soil_id = s.soil_id ORDER BY s.soil_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SoilQuality;
SELECT location, pH, moisture_level FROM SoilQuality WHERE id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, nutrient_requirement FROM CropRecommendations WHERE id > 5;
SELECT nitrogen_level, phosphorus_level, potassium_level FROM NutrientLevels ORDER BY nitrogen_level DESC;
SELECT farmer_name, location FROM FarmerData INNER JOIN SoilQuality ON FarmerData.soil_id = SoilQuality.id;
SELECT * FROM SoilQuality WHERE pH > 6.5;
SELECT id, crop_name FROM CropRecommendations WHERE nutrient_requirement = 'High';
SELECT location, pH, moisture_level FROM SoilQuality ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT FertilizerInventory.fertilizer_name, FertilizerInventory.quantity, FarmerData.farmer_name FROM FertilizerInventory INNER JOIN FarmerData ON FertilizerInventory.id = FarmerData.id;

SELECT SoilQuality.location, NutrientLevels.nitrogen_level, NutrientLevels.phosphorus_level, NutrientLevels.potassium_level FROM SoilQuality LEFT JOIN NutrientLevels ON SoilQuality.id = NutrientLevels.soil_id WHERE SoilQuality.moisture_level < 0.5;
